summary: This is an FBI Daily News Briefing email from November 23, 2021, summarizing a Newsweek article. The article reports on Ian Maxwell, brother of Ghislaine Maxwell, defending Prince Andrew against sexual abuse allegations and criticizing the FBI for ignoring evidence from an accuser.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Described as Jeffrey Epstein's former lover, accused of grooming underage girls for him to abuse between 1994 and 2004, which she denies. She is the subject of a trial mentioned in the document.

persons.name: Ian Maxwell
persons.role: Brother of Ghislaine Maxwell, public commentator
persons.context: Ghislaine Maxwell's brother who defended Prince Andrew in a BBC Radio 4 interview. He criticized the FBI for ignoring evidence from an accuser and questioned why that accuser was not part of his sister's trial.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.role: British royal, accused of sexual abuse
persons.context: Defended by Ian Maxwell against sexual abuse allegations from Jeffrey Epstein's accusers. Specifically accused of rape and intentionally inflicting emotional distress by an accuser named in the article.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referenced as the New York financier for whom Ghislaine Maxwell allegedly groomed underage girls to abuse. His name provides the context for the allegations against others.

connections.description: Ian Maxwell is the brother of Ghislaine Maxwell, as stated in the document. He is publicly defending his sister's interests and commenting on her trial.
Described as Epstein's former lover and accused of grooming underage girls for him to abuse between 1994 and 2004.
Ian Maxwell is publicly defending Prince Andrew against sexual abuse allegations in a media interview.
Implied connection as Prince Andrew is facing allegations related to Jeffrey Epstein's sex abuse case.

events.title: Ian Maxwell BBC Radio 4 Interview
events.description: Ian Maxwell, brother of Ghislaine Maxwell, gave an interview on BBC Radio 4 where he defended Prince Andrew from Jeffrey Epstein's sex abuse allegations and criticized the FBI for ignoring an accuser's evidence.

events.title: Period of alleged abuse by Epstein and Maxwell
events.description: The timeframe during which Ghislaine Maxwell is accused of grooming underage girls for Jeffrey Epstein to abuse.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell's Trial
events.description: The ongoing or recent trial of Ghislaine Maxwell is referenced, with Ian Maxwell noting that a particular vocal accuser of Prince Andrew is not among the accusers at his sister's trial.

keyFacts: Ian Maxwell, brother of Ghislaine Maxwell, publicly defended Prince Andrew against sexual abuse allegations linked to Jeffrey Epstein.
Ian Maxwell claimed the FBI ignored evidence from a vocal accuser of Prince Andrew, and noted this accuser was not part of the evidence in Ghislaine Maxwell's trial.
Ghislaine Maxwell is accused of grooming underage girls for Jeffrey Epstein to abuse between 1994 and 2004.
Prince Andrew has been accused of rape and intentionally inflicting emotional distress by an accuser in the Epstein case.
